name: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc.
summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. is a holding company that operates as a pharmacy-led health and wellbeing company. It operates through three core segments: the U.S. Retail Pharmacy segment (Walgreens), the International segment (Boots), and the U.S. Healthcare segment (VillageMD, Shields Health Solutions, and CareCentrix). The company provides a wide range of products and services, including prescription drugs, health and wellness products, and beauty products.
